usage: lerpSunDirection(<dir to sun now>, <dir to sun at end>, <lerp time>)
description: Overrides the sun direction for a level. Use "resetSunDirection" to revert to the map's values. The direction will lerp from the current direction on the client.

params.name: dir to sun now
description: The direction to the sun now. It need not be normalized.

params.name: dir to sun at end
description: The direction to the sun after lerp time. It need not be normalized.

params.name: lerp time
description: Time in seconds to lerp over.
